website_summaries.verdict: Made for use in the backyard or around the pool, this football has bright, fun colors for use in daytime, and it glows at night.
pros: Football cover has a rubbery fabric that’s also soft, making it easy to grip and throw in the water, especially for younger kids
Will float on top of the water, so it doesn’t become water-logged
cons: Not an official size, so it’s only for recreational play
Laces and stitching may come loose as you play

customer_reviews.title: since it seems like this items would sell like hotcakes at toy stores/pool ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen this item available anywhere except online. Not sure why, since it seems like this items would sell like hotcakes at toy stores/pool supply stores. I'm not a football-throwing fan. However, this football is a blast! Essentially, it seems to be a neoprene-covered, football-shaped beach ball. This is perfect for a pool. Fun to toss back and forth in the pool, soft/light enough that if you get bapped by it (skipping it on the water), it will not hurt, especially for family members. Makes a good splash. Sometimes even more fun to throw short just to douse the catcher.
customer_reviews.author: P. Walton

customer_reviews.title: No dogs allowed!
customer_reviews.text: We have dogs running around our pool trying to catch the balls the kids are throwing in the pool. Of course balls bounce or get overthrown. We had just taken this out of the box, ONE throw and ONE bite later it was done. So i’m sure this is a great product for the kids in the pool and I know the dogs are my fault but it didn’t even last 5 minutes in our household. I wish the lining was sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Allison I. Marcoz

customer_reviews.title: Fun! But starting to unravel
customer_reviews.text: The kids have been using this for about a month straight and it’s been great. The laces are just starting to unravel though.. so we will see how it holds up for the rest of the summer. I’m guessing this may be a one summer pool toy, hopefully I’m proven wrong though!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: No-glo is No-go
customer_reviews.text: There were multiple footballs for the pool that I could have chosen. The reason that I selected this one is that it is supposed to glow and would be fun to play with in the pool at night. IT WOULD NOT GLOW IN THE DARK. I hate false advertising and I hate wasting my money on a products that do not work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! lots of fun and easy for the kids to throw. It stays on top of the water and has lasted so far. Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Popped
customer_reviews.text: We bought this thing for a pool party and it popped pretty quickly. It's basically a thick balloon covered in a thin layer of neoprene.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Soliman

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Our family love bringing this water football to the beach. Floats, doesn’t get saturated and makes good spirals! Good water fun!
customer_reviews.author: Twilitegolf

customer_reviews.title: Not glow in dark
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it says glow in the dark, it does not. Lightweight, cheap construction but still a football
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for Pool Days
customer_reviews.text: The kids are able to throw it all the way across the pool with no problem. Super soft yet durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Laces Should have held up better for the price
customer_reviews.text: The boys had fun with this ball, laces kept coming undone which was annoying. Ball didn't glow as much as we thought it would
customer_reviews.author: Kate Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Essential for any pool or lake trip
customer_reviews.text: My family has so much fun with this in the summer. First one caught a thorn in a bush after an errant throw and I replaced w a competitor version that came close, but this one is superior.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for pool play
customer_reviews.text: My kids love to play with this in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great toy at the pool
customer_reviews.text: Great pool/beach toy for everyone. Boys would also use it in the backyard. Loved the colors.
customer_reviews.author: SBO

customer_reviews.title: Worked one time
customer_reviews.text: This ball was great the first time we used it at the pool. It quickly deflated and will not work anymore, despite putting air in it. The ball we received was very cheaply made and not durable. Returning and getting a new brand. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this football. Works well in th pool.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M Woodyard

customer_reviews.title: Defective, please send replacement
customer_reviews.text: The product is defective. One end of the football is irregularly shaped due to defective stitching and prevents it from spiraling like a football. We need a proper replacement and will revise review once received.
customer_reviews.author: D Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Laces came out on day 2. Cannot not use, poor craft. Will email vendor for refund as soon as I return from vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t fully inflate.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for the boat. Finally went to use it after being in the boat for 2 weeks and it was completely flat. I went to re-inflate it and it would only inflate a third of the way. Of course it’s 2 days beyond the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Kids enjoy this football in the pool, made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to throw but no glow.
customer_reviews.text: My boys like the football but the glow in the dark aspect doesn’t work so well.
customer_reviews.author: Cristee Pieschl-Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. It is nice and sturdy even in the water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun ball for the pool. A bit round for a football.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P

customer_reviews.title: Will not air up.
customer_reviews.text: The valve is trash do not waste your time buying this.
customer_reviews.author: yale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. Bright colors. Fun for pool or beach.
customer_reviews.author: Concern Consumer

product_meta.title: Pumponator Neo Splash Football, Glow in The Dark
product_meta.description: Neo splash- the ultimate Glow in The Dark water football. Featuring a sure-grip rubberized fabric surface, with bright colors. Best of all, they Glow in The Dark!.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars332 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
